name: Pocket Eggy
description:
Cook your fridge full of eggs on your broken stove-top and beat an intensely difficult 25 levels. Your heart may be racing when the eggs start burning and your kitchen may get a little toasty, but your job relies on getting those eggs on the plates of customers. Grab extra eggs from the fridge if needed and buy some from the in-game store. Use the spatula to move completed eggs to the plate, the final destination of the game. Don't forget that the chef is always watching, so don't mess up!!

This is a Humpback Company LLC production. We hope you enjoy the egg flops, splats, sizzles!
